# Load Libraries

```{r setup, include=FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(MASS)
```

# Head of Iris dataset

```{r}
head(iris, 2)
```

```{r}
fit.LDA = lda( Species ~ ., iris)
```

```{r}
#Perform classification
fit.LDA.C = predict(fit.LDA, newdata=iris[,c(1,2,3,4)])$class
fit.LDA.C
```
